channel.title: python on xfurna
channel.description: Recent content in python on xfurna

item.title: CoALapy
item.description: coalapy A pypi package for performing multimodal data clustering. Content coalapy Content About CoALa Installation Clone coalapy Install dependencies- pipenv way Install dependencies- virtualenv way Install coalapy Usage Dependency Graph Contributions License About CoALa CoALa(Convex-combination of Approximate Laplacians) algorithm inside! Know more about CoALa here. Installation Until it is published on pypi, you have to install it in editable mode from the repository clone itself.

item.title: CoVup Setu
item.description: Because services that have setu in their names are rad' cool. Github/CoVup repository 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 ├── meta.json ├── README.md ├── scripts │ ├── main.py └── templates ├── announce.txt └── subscribers.txt I have made such arrangements (using WayScript) that the script scripts/main.py would trigger itself off every day and send an email to all the subscribers regarding the latest CoV pandemic stats about their district (like active cases, confirmed cases, recovered cases and deceased cases).
